tool_description: Indexes product catalog data for efficient search operations, creating structured representations with metadata and searchable fields.

catalog_data_source.description: Path or identifier for the product catalog data source

index_type.description: Type of index to create: elasticsearch, solr, or custom

update_mode.description: Index update mode: full or incremental

error_messages: Invalid data source: Ensure the catalog_data_source path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported index type: Use one of [elasticsearch, solr, custom].
Invalid update mode: Use either 'full' or 'incremental'.
Indexing failed: Check data format and system resources availability.
usage: Provide catalog_data_source and index_type to create or update the product search index. Use update_mode to control full vs incremental updates.

index_size_mb.description: Size of the created index in megabytes
